verses.verse: (The Happiness of Those Whose Help Is the LORD) Praise the LORD! ((Ps. 31:23)) Praise the LORD, O my soul!
(Ps. 103:1) While I live I will praise the LORD; I will sing praises to my God while I have my being.
(Ps. 104:33) Do not put your trust in princes, Nor in a son of man, in whom there is no help.
((Is. 2:22)) His spirit departs, he returns to his earth; In that very day ((Eccl. 12:7)) his plans perish.
((Ps. 33:10; 1 Cor. 2:6)) Happy is he who has the God of Jacob for his help, Whose hope is in the LORD his God,
(Jer. 17:7) Who made heaven and earth, The sea, and all that is in them; Who keeps truth forever,
(Gen. 1:1; Ex. 20:11; Acts 4:24; Rev. 14:7) Who executes justice for the oppressed, (Ps. 103:6) Who gives food to the hungry. (Ps. 107:9) The LORD gives freedom to the prisoners.
(Ps. 107:10; Is. 61:1) The LORD opens the eyes of the blind; (Matt. 9:30; (John 9:7, 32, 33)) The LORD raises those who are bowed down; The LORD loves the righteous.
(Luke 13:13) The LORD watches over the strangers; He relieves the fatherless and widow; (Deut. 10:18; Ps. 68:5) But the way of the wicked He turns upside down.
(Ps. 147:6) The LORD shall reign foreverâ€” Your God, O Zion, to all generations. Praise the LORD!
